--- select_singer_with_where_and_op.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerID = 1 OR FirstName = "foobar" AND LastName = "fizzbuzz"

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      18,
            end:      25,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint:       (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:         (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where: &parser.Where{
      pos:  26,
      Expr: &parser.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "AND",
        Left: &parser.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "OR",
          Left: &parser.BinaryExpr{
            Op:   "=",
            Left: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  34,
              end:  42,
              Name: "SingerID",
            },
            Right: &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   45,
              end:   46,
              Value: "1",
            },
          },
          Right: &parser.BinaryExpr{
            Op:   "=",
            Left: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  50,
              end:  59,
              Name: "FirstName",
            },
            Right: &parser.StringLiteral{
              pos:   62,
              end:   70,
              Value: "foobar",
            },
          },
        },
        Right: &parser.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "=",
          Left: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  75,
            end:  83,
            Name: "LastName",
          },
          Right: &parser.StringLiteral{
            pos:   86,
            end:   96,
            Value: "fizzbuzz",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerID = 1 OR FirstName = "foobar" AND LastName = "fizzbuzz"
